casebody.data:
Friday, September 25, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-1756. Amada, Inc. v. Zaggario.

Cuyahoga App. No. 73089. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.
